snippet: The world's largest publicly traded hedge fund said on Tuesday that client outflows from its funds totaled $1 billion during the first quarter of the year, as pressure mounted on the firm to improve its performance.
abstract: The world's largest publicly traded hedge fund said on Tuesday that client outflows from its funds totaled $1 billion during the first quarter of the year, as pressure mounted on the firm to improve its performance.

headline.main: Man Group Reports $1 Billion of Client Outflows
